item.title: A trader is long on XPL with 3x leverage, with an unrealized profit of approximately $175,000
item.description: On August 22nd, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a trader has established a 3x leverage long position on XPL. Currently, the floating profit is approximately $175,000. Another trader has taken a 3x leverage short position on XPL and is facing a floating loss of around $122,000.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem Meme Coin neet Surpasses $26 Million Market Cap, Surging Over 41% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 22nd, according to GMGN market data, the Meme coin neet within the Solana ecosystem has a market capitalization exceeding $26 million. It has a 24-hour increase of more than 41% and a 24-hour trading volume of $3.8 million.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins have no actual use cases and experience large price fluctuations. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: XPL Pre-market Trading Price Surges Past $0.5, Fully Diluted Valuation Reaches $5 Billion
item.description: On August 22nd, the pre-market trading price of the XPL (Plasma) perpetual contract on Binance exceeded $0.5 and is currently trading at $0.505. XPL has a total supply of 10 billion tokens, and its current fully diluted valuation is $5 billion.Hyperliquid witnessed that the pre-market perpetual contract price of XPL broke through $0.5 and is currently priced at $0.508.

item.title: Binance Wallet will launch Hemi's exclusive Pre-TGE, with an Alpha Point threshold of 240 points.
item.description: On August 22nd, the Binance Wallet will hold an exclusive Hemi Pre-TGE event. Users whose Binance Alpha points are greater than or equal to 240 can participate in this Pre-TGE event through the Alpha event page, and participating in this event will consume 10 points.Event time: August 22nd, 2025, 20:00 - 22:00 (UTC+8).

item.title: Ethena has announced the establishment of a new Qualified Asset Framework to approve collateral assets
item.description: On August 22nd, Ethena Labs made an official announcement. A new Qualified Asset Framework has been established to approve collateral assets, with a specific focus on the USDe-backed perpetual futures section. Within this new framework, BNB has been approved as the first asset to support USDe. BNB is the first newly approved asset. Meanwhile, XRP and HYPE also meet all the criteria stipulated by the framework and are expected to be listed as candidate assets shortly. The Risk Committee of Ethena Labs will regularly update the list of approved collateral assets. It should be noted that approval does not necessarily imply immediate listing.

item.title: Stablecoin Project Plasma Overview and Tokenomics Summary
item.description: August 22nd. Presently, the $250 million quota for the second round of Binance Plasma USDT fixed-term product was snapped up within just 3 minutes, which has attracted significant attention in the market. On June 9th, an address spent 39.15 ETH (valued at approximately $100,000) on extremely high Gas fees and became the first address to make a Plasma deposit, successfully staking 10.17 million USDC.The Plasma backer lineup is quite powerful. It is a Layer 1 blockchain designed specifically for stablecoins, aiming to optimize stablecoin payments and settlements and provide an efficient, low-cost, and secure transaction experience. Previously, it was backed by Peter Thiel's Founders Fund. In February of this year, it announced a $24 million funding round ($20 million Series A funding and $4 million seed funding), led by Framework Ventures, with the participation of cryptocurrency exchange Bitfinex, venture capitalist Peter Thiel, and Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino.On July 17th, Plasma anno

item.title: Kraken Completes Deployment of Distributed Validator Technology, Enhancing Its Ethereum Staking Service
item.description: On August 22nd, according to TheBlock, the U.S.-based cryptocurrency exchange Kraken announced that it has successfully completed the implementation of Distributed Validator Technology (DVT) by leveraging the SSV Network. This move is aimed at optimizing its Ethereum staking service and improving system stability. The SSV Network, which serves as a dedicated protocol for DVT, enhances the operational efficiency of validators by achieving geographical and client diversification.

item.title: Bybit to Launch XPL Perpetual Contract
item.description: August 22nd. Bybit will list the XPL USDT perpetual contract on the Pre-Market at 18:45 on August 22nd.

item.title: XPL (Plasma) pre-market trading price on Binance is currently at $0.3862.
item.description: On August 22nd, Binance launched U-indexed XPL (Plasma) perpetual contract trading. The pre-market price of XPL is currently at $0.3862.Hyperliquid has initiated XPL pre-market perpetual contract trading. The current pre-market trading price of XPL on Hyperliquid is $0.399.

item.title: UnicornX Announces New Season of Unicall ZKWASM "Diamond Hands Reward" Rules
item.description: August 22nd. As per the official announcement, UnicornX has disclosed the details of the new round of Unicall ZKWASM "Diamond Hand Reward", which encompass the following:· Eligibility Requirements: Users who made purchases but did not sell on UnicornX between 21:29:20 on August 21st and 12:00:00 on August 22nd (in UTC+8 time zone) are eligible. The reference price is determined based on the market price at 17:30 on August 22nd.· Reward Mechanism: If the weighted average purchase price is higher than the reference price, the platform will issue additional tokens to bring the average purchase cost down to the reference price.· Airdrop Timeline: Starting from 17:30 on August 22nd (in UTC+8 time zone), the rewards will be distributed within 72 hours and will be directly credited to the trading wallet address.UnicornX stated that this mechanism is designed to reward long-term holders and community supporters, demonstrating a long-term perspective and a commitment to transparency.
